title: Incentive Developers to do your Github issues | Feature
hero_subheading: Attach directly a Reward in Github to your features, fixes, audit... to incentive Developers to complete them in a given time.
video_demo_heading: Offer a Deal to Developers in a Few Seconds
video_demo_description: Directly on Github your will create the deal and it will automatically appears to developpers avec une preuve de mise sous séquestre de la récompense pour inciter les developeurs à réaliser la tache.
